head.title: Nina Harun Wed To David DeLong

hedline.hl1: Nina Harun Wed To David DeLong

block.p: Nina Therese Harun, a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph S. Harun of Mendham, N.J., was married there yesterday in the Church of St. Joseph to David Francis DeLong, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Louis F. DeLong of Fairbanks, Alaska. Msgr. Kenneth E. Lasch performed the ceremony.

Ms. Harun, 29 years old, will keep her name. A graduate of Beloit College, she is studying for a doctorate in geology at the University of Texas at Austin. Her father is the corporate vice president for medical and scientific affairs at Carter Wallace pharmaceuticals in New York.

Mr. DeLong, 32, graduated from Deep Spring and Reed Colleges. He is the director of housing development for the Tanana Chiefs Corporation, a tribal health and welfare group in Alaska. His father is the president of Software Support Systems in Corvallis, Ore., and the owner of radio station KFAR in Fairbanks.
